title: Moomin: The Complete Tove Jansson Comic Strip, Vol. 04
description: More delightful tales from the legendary Finnish artistDrawn & Quarterly's bestselling Moomin series, created by the legendary children's author Tove Jansson, is now in its fourth installment. The series is the winner of the Harvey Award and has been nominated for multiple Eisner Awards.
author: Tove Jansson
